Domestic Serivces and Property Management

Whether it's an office, a bar, a residence, a holiday home, or a caravan, our uniformed, friendly, and trustworthy staff can get it clean. We do daily, weekly, or monthly cleans, as well as one-offs: spring cleans, moving-in and moving-out, special event cleaning (pre- and post-event), and ironing. We provide all cleaning supplies and equipment.

Got a holiday home? Maid-it have a team of professionals with over 10 years' experience to care for and maintain your property when you can't be there.


Maid-it: we're there when you can't be!

Terms

Minimum 2 hours.

Maid-it is situated in Castle Douglas
